mapper.sql: F_ID, F_WHSMC, F_WHSDZ, F_WHXM, F_LXR, F_LXFS,F_CZ,F_EMAIL,F_REMARK, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) F_CRDATE , date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) F_CHDATE
mapper.select:
select
from bes_eq_maintainer
1=1
and CONCAT(`f_whsmc`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into bes_eq_maintainer(F_ID, F_WHSMC,F_WHSDZ, F_WHXM,F_LXR,F_LXFS, F_CZ,F_EMAIL,F_REMARK, F_CRDATE, F_CHDATE) values (#{f_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_whsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_whsdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_whxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_lxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{f_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_crdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{f_chdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update bes_eq_maintainer set F_WHSMC = #{f_whsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_WHSDZ = #{f_whsdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_WHXM = #{f_whxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_LXR = #{f_lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_LXFS = #{f_lxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CZ = #{f_cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_EMAIL = #{f_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REMARK = #{f_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CHDATE = #{f_chdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE F_ID=#{f_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
